body: C Custer from China Geek has been following up "My Father is Li Gang" incident by translating local reporter Wang Keqin's investigation. Part I: Chen Family Forced to Drop Suit, Part II: Family Goes Silent, Legal Rumblings and Part III: “A Sleepless Night in Xiaofeng’s Home”.

title: China: Latest Story Behind the Li Gang Case

sentence: C Custer from China Geek has been following up "My Father is Li Gang" incident by translating local reporter Wang Keqin's investigation.
Part I: Chen Family Forced to Drop Suit, Part II: Family Goes Silent, Legal Rumblings and Part III: “A Sleepless Night in Xiaofeng’s Home”.
